price: Tí kì í bá ṣe ti àkọsílẹ̀ kan tó ti gbawájú láti ọ̀dọ̀ Allāhu ni, ọwọ́ ìyà ńlá kò bá tẹ̀ yín nípa n̄ǹkan tí ẹ gbà (ní owó ìtúsílẹ̀).
arabic: لَّوۡلَا كِتَٰبٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ سَبَقَ لَمَسَّكُمۡ فِيمَآ أَخَذۡتُمۡ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٞ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: lawlā kitābun mina al-lahi sabaqa lamassakum fīmā akhadhtum ʿadhābun ʿaẓīmun
